intro: Eriostemon pinoides, commonly known as the narrow-leaf mistletoe, is a hemiparasitic plant native to eastern Australia. Eriostemon pinoides plays a role in local ecosystems by providing food for native fauna and contributing to the biodiversity of its habitat.
